name: Car Vibration Sound & Light Alarm with Remote, ELECTOP 108dB Automobile Anti-Theft Vibration Alert, Anti-Theft LED Flashing Security Light Wireless Remote Vehicle Security Alert with 2pcs Alarm
short_description: High Sensitivity Car Alarm Light - When the car alarm detects ordinary vibration such as impact, bump, etc., it will emit a high pitched warning sound lasting for 2 seconds, accompanied by flashing LED lights; when the car anti-theft alarm detects violent vibration such as prying doors and windows, or many times of ordinary vibration, it will immediately emit 6 kinds of alarm tones at the automobile level, and the LED indicator lights will flash blindly, so as to make thieves run away!

108dB Car Anti-theft Vibration Alarm - The car sound and light alarm can emit up to 108dB loud alarm sound, effectively scare off potential thieves and ensure your car safety. 3-steps volume adjustable design to meet the needs of different environments, don't have to worry about the alarm sound is too loud or too small, can be an effective warning but also to avoid the unnecessary noise interference.

Magnetic Mounting Design - The anti-theft vibration alarm adopts magnetic mounting technology, which allows for quick installation and removal of the car alarm light without any additional tools. Whether it is on the front or rear windshield, door frame, dashboard, or sun visor of the car, it can be easily fixed to ensure that the sound and light alarm can work solidly and reliably in any position.

Wireless Remote Control Alarm - Vehicle security alarm can be used with multiple hosts or multiple remote controls, fully adapted to the individual security needs of the vehicle. A single remote control can be matched with up to 50 alarm hosts and is controlled wirelessly for easy and efficient operation. With a wireless control range of up to 66 feet, the remote control allows you to conveniently activate or deactivate the alarm without having to get close to the car.

High Quality PC Material - The vibration sensing alarm is specially designed for automobiles with excellent heat resistance and low temperature stability (operating temperature range: -40°C to +70°C), suitable for a variety of climatic conditions, to ensure stable operation in the high temperature environment of the car in the summer. Made of high quality UV resistant PC material to ensure that the car alarm light is not easy to age and fade in long-term use, durable and reliable.

name: ELECTOP Car Solar Power Simulated Dummy Alarm, Anti-Theft LED Flashing Security, Automotive Warning Safety Light with USB Charging Port, 2PCS (Red)
short_description: IT NEVER HURTS TO HAVE AN EXTRA DETERRENT! - Designed to deter those with malicious intentions, this fake car alarm light keeps potential thieves guessing and acts as a strong visual deterrent. Add an extra layer of security to your vehicle.

SOLAR-POWERED SECURITY LIGHT - The upgraded car false alarm light is powered by solar energy and will automatically charge in the sun. It can blink all night long after getting enough sunlight during the day. Note: This LED does not blink when there is sufficient light. If you want it to blink during the day, just partially cover the other end.

DUAL CHARGING CAPABILITIES - In addition to solar power, this analog alarm light features a convenient USB charging port for backup power during overcast or rainy days. Built-in light sensor, intelligently senses the intensity of light. It blinks every 5 seconds when the switch is on and the light is dim. Just turn off the switch if you don't want it to work.

SIMPLE INSTALLATION - Featuring strong double-sided tape on the bottom, this light can be effortlessly mounted on various surfaces such as the Rearview Mirror, Center Console, Car Door, or Rear Window. Ensure the surface is clean and dry before installation for optimal adhesion.

PACKAGE INCLUDED - Package includes 2 dummy alarm lights(red light). Choose between red or blue light specifications based on your preference. Should you have any questions or require assistance, our responsive customer service team is available to address your inquiries promptly.
